name: Corporation Name
charta: Prompt segment defining which tasks the corporation is designed to process, intended to allow for the screening of requests.
initialReceiver: Unit name of the unit receiving the initial request prompt.

dataSet.name: Dataset Name. Datasets are saved to the database on a per-project bases and are linked to units.

structure.parameterName: Set any number of parameters and default values here.

agents.name: Agent Name
agents.api: URL of the api serving the model
agents.outputModel: internal.DatasetName //Comment: This DataSet's default values, converted to JSON, will be appended to each prompt to this agent with the instructions to respond using its structure.

pipe.receiverType: Unit //Comment: Can be Unit or Agent
pipe.retrieverType: fromDataSet //Comment: Get the target to be prompted from dataset (fromDataSet), or always send prompts to a static unit or agent (static), or determine the target using a plugin function (fromPlugin)
pipe.retriever: internal.Contract.department //Comment: In this example, the 'department' property is received from the active 'Contract' DataSet attached to this unit.

defaultReceiver.type: Agent //Comment: can be Agent or Unit
defaultReceiver.name: Unit Name.Agent Name
